# Architecture Decision Records

**Record of Architectural Decisions**

*Auto-generated from code annotations on {{ generated_at.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') }}*

---

## What are ADRs?

Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) capture important architectural decisions made during development, along with their context and consequences. They help future developers understand why certain choices were made.
